messages.subject: Homeschool Conference
messages.msgSnippet: I normally just lurk on the list but I wanted to let you know about LEARNapalooza, A homeschooling experience sponsored by LEARN with workshops for new &
messages.messageBody:
I normally just lurk on the list but I wanted to let you know about
LEARNapalooza, A homeschooling experience sponsored by LEARN with workshops
for new & veteran homeschoolers, unschoolers, teens, & children. May 28, 29
& 30th, 2004 Hyatt Regency Hotel - Crown Center Kansas City, MO.
www.kclearn.org This is the first year for the conference but it looks like
it's going to be great. I hope that I can meet some of you there.

Cindy

>UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:


How do you go about setting up a conference, I mean is there a Dummies for
conference book,LOL? Laura ******************************** Laura,

This e-mail just jumped out at me!!! Are you considering planning one? At
the last conference Barb and I got so excited we tentatively volunteered
Columbus for the 2006 conference location. If there are three of us working
on it it would be much easier.....

Marjorie
